short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closes all Google Search tabs when clicked to free up tabs and save your sanity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's about 15 lines of code. Just click the button (or press Ctrl+Shift+Z ) and your tabs close.

Permissions Explanation: This extension will ask for your permission to read your browsing history.

I don't want or care to know what you're looking at. The only way for this extension to selectively close search tabs it to look at the URL, and check for a prefix ("google.con/search?q", for example) and looking at your URLs falls under the Browsing History permissions category.
